name: Beam Master
description:
Your a hero of Soda Land, called the Beam Master.

Can you kill all the out grown spinner plants, Don't get hit because they hurt

Also a huge thanks you @LegionGames for the SFX and the leader board implementation.

Go follow him at:

Twitter: @legiongames1

Itch.io: https://legiongames.itch.io/

Go and subscribe to my new channel for an explanation on how this game was made and how it works.. Devlog coming soon...

Youtube: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCd1taix6YSF8n72HdywVk9w

Use arrows keys to navigate the menu (First time with a title screen), 

ESC to back out of options if stuck
